SEARCH
Package pt.uc.dei.services

Class ConfigurationService

java.lang.Object
pt.uc.dei.services.ConfigurationService
public class ConfigurationService extends Object
Service class for managing configuration-related operations.

Provides methods for retrieving the latest system configuration and creating new configurations. Utilizes ConfigurationRepository for persistence and UserRepository for user-related operations.

  • Method Details

    • getLatestConfiguration

      public ConfigurationDTO getLatestConfiguration()
      Retrieves the latest configuration from the database.

      Constructs a ConfigurationDTO object based on the latest persisted ConfigurationEntity.

      Returns:
      The latest ConfigurationDTO if found, null otherwise.

    • createNewConfiguration

      public boolean createNewConfiguration(ConfigurationDTO configurationDto)
      Creates a new configuration entry in the database.
      Parameters:
      configurationDto - The configuration data transfer object containing the necessary configuration details
      Returns:
      true if the configuration was successfully created, false otherwise
